DataElement.preferredDefinition: The time of examination represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the time of examination (as complete as possible).

ReferenceDocuments.name: PEDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable PEDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Collect time if it is relevant for the analysis.
